title: Video: My Panda Shall Fly ft. Adventure Elephant – Opening Embrace
content:
Today’s feeling more and more loved up as more and more fantastic bits drop into our inbox.

Noisey have just premiered the new video for My Panda Shall Fly track, Opening Embrace. A vaguely dark, highly stylised and surreal introduction to the world of My Panda. It’s stomach churning at times, extremely awkward and yet utterly transfixing. Hit play below.

Directed by Chris Toumazou.

My Panda Shall Fly & Adventure Elephant’s, “Maccron Accent,” to be released March 25th, 2013 by Tape Club Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
